no-restricted-syntax.message: ❌ Use RADIUS_TOKENS instead of hardcoded rounded-* classes. Import from '@/tokens' and use getRadius().
❌ Use INTERACTIVE_TOKENS.minHeight instead of hardcoded min-h-[]. Import from '@/tokens' and use getMinHeight().
❌ Use SHADOW_TOKENS instead of hardcoded shadow-* classes. Import from '@/tokens' and use getShadow().
❌ Use COLOR_TOKENS.neutral.border instead of hardcoded border-gray-* classes. Import from '@/tokens' and use getNeutralColor().
❌ Use COLOR_TOKENS.neutral.text* instead of hardcoded text-gray-* classes. Import from '@/tokens' and use getNeutralColor().
❌ Use COLOR_TOKENS.neutral.bg* instead of hardcoded bg-gray-* classes. Import from '@/tokens' and use getNeutralColor().
❌ Use COLOR_TOKENS.semantic.* instead of hardcoded text-{color}-* classes. Import from '@/tokens' and use getSemanticColor().
❌ Use TRANSITION_TOKENS.common.* instead of hardcoded transition-* classes. Import from '@/tokens' and use getTransition().
❌ Use TRANSITION_TOKENS.duration.* instead of hardcoded duration-* classes. Import from '@/tokens' and use getDuration().
